Name: IDETooltip_LaptopMode_Description
English: In Laptop Mode you can pan, scroll and zoom by moving the mouse over an area\nwhile holding ${LaptopLZoomKey} to zoom and Left Alt to pan and scroll.\nUse ${LaptopRHSKeys} for non-mouse interactions while Laptop Mode is enabled.
Translation: 在笔记本电脑模式下，您可以通过将鼠标移到某个区域上来进行平移，滚动和缩放\n，同时按住 ${LaptopLZoomKey} 进行缩放，并按住Left Alt进行平移和滚动。\n在启用笔记本电脑模式时，使用 ${LaptopRHSKeys} 进行非鼠标交互。

Name: IDE_FatalErrorTitle
Comment: Title for the fatal error warning dialog

Name: IDE_FatalErrorWarning
English: GameMaker has become unstable.\nPlease save changes and exit.
Translation: GameMaker 变得不稳定。\n请保存更改并退出。
Comment: Warn the user they should try saving changes and exit

Name: IDE_FolderPermsWarning
Dialog_CopyToClipboard
Comment: Copy the dialog message to the clipboard

Comment: the ide version information string when running from steam

Comment: Update new version dialog - download now button

Name: UpdateDialogRemindMe
Comment: Update new version dialog - remind me later button

Name: UpdateDialogLabel
English: New version is available! \nYou are on v{0}\nNew version is {1}
Translation: 新版本可用！\n现在是 v{0}\n新版本是 {1}
Comment: Update new version dialog - tell user which version they are on and which version update will take them to

Name: UpdateDialogReleaseNotes
Comment: Update new version dialog - view release notes button

Name: install_IDE_update
English: Restart requested to install IDE update.
Translation: 已请求重启以安装IDE更新。

Comment: A message which is shown when the RSS feed is not accessible

Name: LanguageLoad_StartupError
English: Could not load language {0}. Check your ui.log for details
Translation: 无法加载语言{0}。有关详细信息，请查看您的 ui.log

Name: ProgressBar_Install
Comment: the progress bar caption while installing

Name: PluginWarning_AssemblyNotFoundError
English: Assembly not found for GMPluginAssembly {0}, path {1}
Translation: 找不到 GMPluginAssembly {0}，路径 {1} 的程序集

Name: PluginWarning_ReferencedAssemblyNotFoundError
English: Referenced assembly {1} not found for GMPluginAssembly {0}
Translation: 找不到 GMPluginAssembly {1} 的引用程序集 {0}

Name: PluginWarning_AssemblyNotSignedError
English: Assembly not signed for GMPluginAssembly {0}, path {1}
Translation: 未为 GMPluginAssembly {0} 签名程序集，路径 {1}

Name: PluginWarning_BadAssemblyError
English: Assembly {0} has an unspecified bad format
Translation: 程序集 {0} 具有未指定的错误格式

Name: PluginWarning_BadPortableExecutableFormatError
English: Assembly {0} has a bad portable executable format
Translation: 程序集 {0} 的可移植可执行文件格式不正确

Name: PluginWarning_BadCLRHeaderFormatError
English: Assembly {0} has a bad CLR header format
Translation: 程序集 {0} 的 CLR 头格式不正确

Name: PluginWarning_FoundPluginError
English: {0} IPlugins with a matching name were found in {1} - there can only be one
Translation: 在 {1} 中找到名称匹配的 {0} IPlugins - 只能有一个

Name: PluginWarning_InvalidLanguageFileWarning
English: Language pack {0} has an invalid format
Translation: 语言包 {0} 的格式无效

Name: PluginWarning_LanguageFileNotFoundWarning
English: Language pack {0} could not be found

Name: PluginWarning_NullAssemblyLoadContextError
English: Assembly load context was null for GMPluginAssembly {0}
Translation: GMPluginAssembly {0} 的程序集加载上下文为空

Name: PluginWarning_PluginMetadataLoadError
Translation: 加载插件元数据文件 {0} 时出错

Name: PluginWarning_SymbolsFailedToLoadWarning
English: Symbols failed to load for assembly {0}
Translation: 未能加载程序集 {0} 的符号

Name: UserLogin_RetrySSO
Comment: User Login - Error Retry SSO login

Name: UserLogin_NoRuntime
English: Unable to access the Runtime Feed and no local Runtime installed. Please check your internet connection and start GameMaker again.
Translation: 无法访问运行库源（Runtime Feed）并且未安装本地运行库。请检查您的互联网连接，然后重新启动GameMaker。

Name: UserLogin_RuntimeSpaceWarningMessage
English: Destination drive {0} has only {1} GB free space available.\nAt least 2 GB of free space is recommended - please ensure there is enough free space available before proceeding.
Translation: 目标驱动器 {0} 仅有 {1} GB可用空间。\ n建议至少 2 GB 的可用空间-请确保在继续操作之前有足够的可用空间。

Name: UserLogin_MaxDevice
English: Maximum sign ins exceeded \nYou can manage your account sessions at {0}
Translation: 已超过最大登录次数\n您可以在{0}管理您的帐户会话

Name: User_OK
Comment: User Login - two step authentication ok button

Name: runtime_onstartup_change
English: Do you want to change your current runtime to the latest installed version: {0}?
Translation: 是否想将当前运行时更改为已安装的最新版本：{0}？
Comment: Change current runtime to the version matching the IDE

Name: opera_env_sso_confirm
English: You are using a custom environment for Opera GX settings. If you use Opera Single Sign-on, these settings will be overriden. Do you wish to proceed anyway?
Translation: 您正在使用Opera GX设置的自定义环境。如果您使用Opera单点登录，这些设置将被覆盖。你想继续吗?
Comment: Warning shown when a user tries to log-in via Opera SSO with a custom environment

Name: CodeSnippets_ConversionWarning
English: An old code snippets format was detected. Would you like to convert these to the new format?
Translation: 检测到旧的代码片段格式。您想将这些转换为新格式吗？

Name: runtime_dns_ResolvingFailed
Comment: A title of the warning which is shown when after the IDE failed to resolve an address against an alternative DNS

Name: runtime_dns_ResolvingFailedMessage
English: Could not resolve {0} with an alternative DNS. A system DNS has been used
Translation: 无法使用备用 DNS 解析 {0}。已使用系统 DNS
Comment: Could not use an alternative DNS

Name: ThemeError_MissingComma
English: Error in theme at '{0}', check all entries are separated with commas
Translation: 错误在主题'{0}'，请检查所有条目是否以逗号分隔。

Name: RuntimeDownload_Failed
English: The selected runtime could not fully install
Translation: 选定的运行库无法完全安装

Name: ConvertedRemapsSavePrompt
English: Your remaps file has been converted to a new format. Would you like to save it? This format is not compatible with older versions of GameMaker.
Translation: 您的重映文件已转换为新格式。你想保存吗？此格式与旧版本的GameMaker不兼容。

Name: StyleError_LoadError
Translation: 错误在样式文件{0}\n 原因:{1}

Name: SplashScreen_PluginVerySafeLoadFailed
English: Failed to load the minimum set of plugins required to open the bug reporter. See your ui.log for more details. If issues persist try re-installing GameMaker
Translation: 未能加载打开 Bug 报告所需的最小插件集合。请参阅您的 ui.log 获取更多详细信息。如果问题仍然存在，请尝试重新安装 GameMaker。

Name: SplashScreen_PluginSafeLoadFailed
English: Failed to load the set of plugins included with the IDE. See your ui.log for more details. The IDE will now try relaunching to open the bug reporter
Translation: 未能加载与 IDE 捆绑的插件集合。请参阅您的 ui.log 获取更多详细信息。IDE 将尝试重新启动以打开 Bug 报告器。

Name: SplashScreen_PluginLoadFailedRestart
English: Failed to load your specified plugin set. See your ui.log for more details. The IDE will now try relaunching to open a safe list of plugins
Translation: 未能加载您指定的插件集。 详情请参阅 ui.log。IDE 将尝试重新启动以打开安全的插件列表。

Name: SplashScreen_PluginLoadFailedFallback
English: Failed to load your specified plugin set. See your ui.log for more details. The IDE has loaded a safe set of plugins
Translation: 未能加载您指定的插件集。请参阅 ui.log 获取更多详细信息。IDE 已加载一个安全插件集。
